name: Pasted
description:
You're a tomato.

And you've been selected for the privilege of being this arena's entertainment!

Yay you! 

The rules are simple. Collect the pills.

And don't die, of course. 

You have 60 seconds of action time. Do your best to collect those points!

And if you get less than 800pts, your sibling tomatoes will be next.

Thank you for participating~~~ ^_^

-Sully
